Header.title: Sakari Jawo
Header.paragraph: Cyber Security Engineer and Cloud Professional specializing in Microsoft security, automation, and AI-driven DevOps. Passionate about building secure, scalable, and intelligent solutions that empower modern digital environments.

About.paragraph: I’m a Cyber Security Engineer with over four years of hands-on experience in SOC, SIEM, and cloud security, primarily within the Microsoft ecosystem. I focus on automation, data integration, and cost-efficient cloud security solutions using tools like Microsoft Sentinel, Azure Functions, and Terraform. I’m passionate about developing secure systems through CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code, and AI integration. With a background in DevOps engineering and a strong technical mindset, I enjoy bridging the gap between security operations and modern software development.
Why: 4+ years of Cyber Security and Cloud Engineering experience
Expert in Microsoft Sentinel, Entra ID, and Azure Security
Strong DevOps background with CI/CD and Infrastructure as Code
Experienced in Security Automation, SOAR, and AI-powered solutions
Why2: Proven ability to drive secure digital transformation
Collaborative and structured approach with strong problem-solving skills
Dedicated to continuous learning and innovation in security and cloud

Services.name: Cyber Security Engineering
Services.text: Building and automating secure cloud environments with Microsoft Sentinel, Defender XDR, and Entra ID. Focused on proactive defense and data-driven detection.

Services.name: Cloud Security & Automation
Services.text: Designing and implementing Azure cloud solutions with Infrastructure as Code and CI/CD pipelines for reliable, scalable, and secure deployments.

Services.name: DevOps & Infrastructure as Code
Services.text: Experienced in Terraform, GitHub Actions, and Azure DevOps to enable continuous delivery and robust infrastructure management.

Services.name: AI & SOAR Development
Services.text: Creating automation and enrichment tools that combine AI with SOAR workflows to improve incident response and threat intelligence efficiency.

Services.name: Security Operations
Services.text: Supporting SOC operations through log onboarding, incident enrichment, and integration of threat intelligence for faster, smarter detections.

Services.name: Training & Knowledge Sharing
Services.text: Helping teams understand cloud security, DevOps best practices, and automation through workshops, documentation, and mentoring.

Testimonials.text: "Sakari has a great ability to combine security knowledge with automation skills. His Sentinel automation work has saved us countless analyst hours."
Testimonials.name: Colleague, H&M Group

Testimonials.text: "Professional, reliable, and always looking for innovative ways to improve security workflows. A true asset to any technical team."
Testimonials.name: Team Lead, H&M Group

Features.title: Cloud Security
Features.text: Expertise in Azure security architecture, monitoring, and automation using Microsoft Sentinel, Entra ID, and Defender.

Features.title: Automation & Integration
Features.text: Building automated pipelines and SOAR integrations for improved detection and response capabilities.

Features.title: Infrastructure as Code
Features.text: Designing reliable, repeatable infrastructure using Terraform, Bicep, and Azure DevOps.

Features.title: AI & Innovation
Features.text: Integrating AI agents and data-driven insights into security and DevOps workflows for smarter operations.
